name: Gordon Ramsay
description: When I'm not harassing people in Great Britain, I come to International Burch University to bake cookies!

name: Beyonce
description: 'I married an ugly looking guy because he knew how to bake amazing cookies! So you better learn how to bake!

name: Shaquille O' Neal
description: Want to know how I got so tall? I ate a whole lotta cookies from Burch! Now eat if you wanna get strong!

name: Mark Zuckerberg
description: Burch cookies are the only edible thing humans and lizards have in common. They're even tastier than babies.
